tags.name: rss-items
tags.description:
`rss-items`
`visualize RSS items`

Example:
```html
<rss-items
  url="https://content.therapychat.com/rss.xml"
  max="4"
  auto
></rss-items>
```
It will retrieve the items from the url automatically.

Properties:

  * `items` {`never[]`} - 

  * `auto` {`boolean`} - 

  * `max` {`number`} - 

  * `maxExcerptLength` {`number`} - 

  * `maxTitleLength` {`number`} - 

  * `readMoreAnchorText` {`string`} - 

  * `readMoreImageAlt` {`string`} - 

  * `showReadMore` {`boolean`} -

tags.name: rss-items
tags.description:
`rss-items`
`visualize RSS items`

Example:
```html
<rss-items
  url="https://content.therapychat.com/rss.xml"
  max="4"
  auto
></rss-items>
```
It will retrieve the items from the url automatically.

Attributes:

  * `url` {`string`} - The URL of the RSS.

  * `xml` - 

  * `items` {`any[]`} - The retrieved items array.

  * `auto` {`boolean`} - If true init rss request.

  * `max` {`number`} - Max number of items to show. If it is undefined shows all items.

  * `max-excerpt-length` {`number`} - Max length for item excerpts. If the excerpt exceeds this length it will be trimed and will have an ellipsis appended.

  * `max-title-length` {`number`} - Max length for item titles. If the title exceeds this length it will be trimed and will have an ellipsis appended.

  * `read-more-anchor-text` {`boolean`} - Read more anchor text.

  * `read-more-image-alt` {`boolean`} - Read more image alternative text.

  * `show-read-more` {`boolean`} - If true the items elements will display a read more link.

Properties:

  * `url` {`string`} - The URL of the RSS.

  * `xml` - 

  * `items` {`any[]`} - The retrieved items array.

  * `auto` {`boolean`} - If true init rss request.

  * `max` {`number`} - Max number of items to show. If it is undefined shows all items.

  * `maxExcerptLength` {`number`} - Max length for item excerpts. If the excerpt exceeds this length it will be trimed and will have an ellipsis appended.

  * `maxTitleLength` {`number`} - Max length for item titles. If the title exceeds this length it will be trimed and will have an ellipsis appended.

  * `readMoreAnchorText` {`boolean`} - Read more anchor text.

  * `readMoreImageAlt` {`boolean`} - Read more image alternative text.

  * `showReadMore` {`boolean`} - If true the items elements will display a read more link.

Property: maxExcerptLength

Default: 100

attributes.name: max-title-length
attributes.description:
`max-title-length` {`number`} - Max length for item titles. If the title exceeds this length it will be trimed and will have an ellipsis appended.

Property: maxTitleLength

Default: 50

attributes.name: read-more-anchor-text
attributes.description:
`read-more-anchor-text` {`boolean`} - Read more anchor text.

Property: readMoreAnchorText

Default: Read more

attributes.name: read-more-image-alt
attributes.description:
`read-more-image-alt` {`boolean`} - Read more image alternative text.

Property: readMoreImageAlt

Default:

attributes.name: show-read-more
attributes.description:
`show-read-more` {`boolean`} - If true the items elements will display a read more link.

Property: showReadMore

Default: false
